name: Jumper (itch) (JGUR)
description:
Made for Trijam #179 - 3 Hour Game Jam

Hop through the clouds, traversing the floating islands in the sky. Collect coins and increase your score as you get higher and higher. 

Controls: A & D to move Left & Right. Space to Jump.

Was Developed with Unity, C#, Photoshop and Visual Studio!

Good Luck!
